article_title: Four Years of Obamacare Failures Is Long Enough

article_metadata.description: President Obama marked the fourth anniversary of the passage of Obamacare this week by promising to spend the next year "working to implement and improve on it." He has his work cut out for him. Four years on, the Affordable Care Act has failed to deliver what its name formally promised [...]
article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes
